content: I think I was supposed to eat something soft and fluffy today... Oh! Not you, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>. I meant your birthday cake~!

content: <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, happy birthday! Baa-maa... I forgot to make you a... yarn candle!

content: Hmm, why a yarn candle, you ask? {A两眼放光}'Cause I can knit it reaaally loooong, just like your life! Wishing you a loooong, happy one!
